com.example.sickar.main

Class MainActivity.MainGestureListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • com.example.sickar.libs.OnSwipeListener
        • com.example.sickar.main.MainActivity.MainGestureListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GestureDetector.OnContextClickListener, GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
    Enclosing class:
    MainActivity

    private class MainActivity.MainGestureListener
extends OnSwipeListener
    Handles gestures on the main display. In this case the main display is the arSceneView
